mapper.select: select distinct h.no, h.AptName, h.dealAmount, h.area, h.dealYear, h.dealMonth, h.dealDay, h.floor, h.jibun, b.city, b.gugun, b.dong, i.lat, i.lng, i.buildYear from housedeal h join baseaddress b using (dong) right outer join houseinfo i on h.AptName = i.AptName and h.dong = i.dong where h.AptName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%') order by h.no limit #{start}, #{spp}
